Package FOHClasses

Class Booking

java.lang.Object
FOHClasses.Booking
public class Booking extends Object
A class storing information relating to a booking made.

  • Field Summary

    private int

      The number of guests/covers. Calculated by counting number of coverIds

      Whether the booking had paid for their orders yet

  • Constructor Details

    • Booking

      public Booking(int bookingId, String customerName, String phoneNumber, int waiterId, long startTimestamp, long endTimestamp, int[] tables)
      Constructs a new booking object.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The ID of the booking object to create
      customerName - The full name of the customer making the booking
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the customer making the booking
      waiterId - The unique identification number of the waiter assigned
      startTimestamp - The booking's start time in seconds since the UNIX epoch
      endTimestamp - The booking's end time in seconds since the UNIX epoch
      tables - An array of tableIds booked

  • Method Details

    • addCover

      public void addCover(int coverId)
      Adds a new cover to the booking.
      Parameters:
      coverId - The ID of the cover to add

    • removeCover

      public void removeCover(int coverId)
      Removes a cover from the booking.
      Parameters:
      coverId - The ID of the cover to remove

    • setPaid

      public void setPaid(boolean paid)
      Marks a booking as having paid all of its orders
      Parameters:
      paid - Whether a payment has been made

    • getNumberOfGuests

      public int getNumberOfGuests()

    • isPaid

      public boolean isPaid()
      Returns whether the booking has been paid.
      Returns:
      True if paid, false if still requires payment
